head.title: A Pickle Juice Drinker Finds Validation

hedline.hl1: A Pickle Juice Drinker Finds Validation

abstract.p: Shulamith Troy letter on September 17 article about Philadelphia Eangles drinking pickle juice before games notes he has been drinking pickle juice since childhood (S)

block.p: Regarding ''Salt and Peppier'' (Sept. 17), about the Philadelphia Eagles drinking pickle juice before games, my grown children have always known that I, too, occasionally take a good slug of pickle juice. I am in my 70th decade, and when my parents used to ''put up'' a crock of sour pickles, I was allowed one small drink of the brine, and I always take a drink when we open a new can to this day. Only a true brine will do; never with added vinegar. I can now prove to my children how ''with it'' I really am, thanks to The New York Times.
